displayName: Authentication Methods: Temporary Access Pass usable once
reasonDetail: TAP targets all users; usable-once enforcement is blocked.

details.note: Refusing to enforce isUsableOnce when TAP targets all users; this commonly fails to persist and is high risk.
details.remediation: Scope TAP to a piloted group, then re-run with approval to enforce usable-once.
details.reasonDetail: TAP targets all users; usable-once enforcement is blocked.
